nodes.text: An outpost was located on the planet Ocahont. It was a fairly large, well-established base, which regularly received shipments of goods such as quadanium steel. In 3 BBY, Leia Organa and Amilyn Holdo met Senator Mon Mothma at the base after stowing away on a cargo ship bound there, in order to tell her about fellow Chandrilan senator Winmey Lenz's dealings with the Galactic Empire.
